name: Siolla
description: Developer of a micro-investing platform designed to make investments easy. The company's platform helps to invest small amounts of money into diversified investments like index funds and ETFs, enabling users to secure their family's future.
one_liner: Developer of a micro-investing platform designed to make investments easy. The company's platform helps to invest small amounts of money into diversified investments like index funds and ETFs, enabling users to secure their family's future.
